amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert a new section to provide considerations and procedures in finalizing greenhouse gas regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-54 to insert a new section to provide considerations and procedures in finalizing greenhouse gas regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 266 (Roll no. 234).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
